trans-unit.note: This button launches the Microsoft Store to get updates for the app

trans-unit.source: A mandatory update is available for your app. Update now to continue using it.
trans-unit.target: 必須のアップデートがあります。アプリを使い続けるにはいますぐアップデートしてください。
trans-unit.note: Message informing users that they have to update the app in order to continue using it

trans-unit.target: アップデートの準備ができています
trans-unit.note: Title of the mandatory update available message being shown
This button launches the Windows Settings app to the page that helps users connect to the Internet.

trans-unit.source: The app can't open because you are not connected to the internet. Make sure Wi-Fi is on and try again.
trans-unit.target: インターネットに接続していないため、アプリを開くことができません。 Wi-Fiがオンになっていることを確認して、もう一度お試しください。
trans-unit.note: Message informing users that they have to connect to the internet in order to continue using the app.

trans-unit.target: 接続を確認してください
trans-unit.note: Title of the no internet connection message being shown.
This button refreshes the web page potentially after the user connected to the Internet.
